name: stateliness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a formal, impressive quality, style, or appearance, or a formal, slow movement: She walked with a trembling stateliness up the stairs to her study. The elegant chambers of the Assembly and Senate still exude the stateliness and charm of the 19th century. See
stately
More examplesFewer examplesShe balances stateliness and control with a spellbinding musicality.There's a touch of stateliness to the decor. Using a serif font lends a certain traditional stateliness to the logo.
